Description.Text: The Skyline Hotel is located in the center of the rebirth of the famed Clinton/Hells Kitchen neighborhood of New York City. This hotel feature the best view of the New York City Skyline, but Just a few blocks away from the Theater district, Times Square, Jacob Javitts Convention Center, Intrepid Museum, and fabulous restaurants and nightclubs.

• Skyline Hotel • Broadway and 42nd Street • Theatre District • Rockefeller Center • Radio City Music Hall • Circle Line Cruises • Intrepid Museum • Cruise Ship Terminal • Javits Convention Center • Restaurant Row

The Skyline boasts 231 newly renovated guest rooms that range from 370 square feet to 500 square feet. Each of quest rooms features an array of amenities like flat screen televisions, refrigerators, in room safes and Cali amenities to mention a few. On penthouse level, guest can enjoy a work out and take a dip in our spacious indoor pool, overlooking the New York City Skyline.

The Skyline lobby and public areas, recently renovated, in a sophisticated organic theme of bright green and rust tones. The new Additional seating area off the main lobby, offers guest a place to relax or to browse the internet, using our business center.

1050 Restaurant and Lounge - Casual restaurant/bar with wood floor, banquettes, big-screen TV. Buffet and à carte breakfasts. À la carte lunch and dinner. Bar service and bar menu from midday to after midnight. Italian and American dishes.
